framework

Class Domain

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.Domain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FuzzySymbolicDomain, Interval, MultiDomain, Rectangle, SimpleInterval, SymbolicDomain

    public abstract class Domain
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    This class is used to represent domains of variables. Its main capability is to provide functionality for choosing values from a Variable's domain. This is done through ValueChoiceFunctions, which have to be registered with the domain.
    Author:
    Federico Pecora
